basics.name: Jorge Rodríguez
basics.summary: Focused on continuously learning and building open source projects. Experienced in systems administration with a focus on development operations and cibersecurity.

work.name: Hack The Box
responsibilities: Use of basic reconnaissance scripts with Nmap
Use of proxies such as Burp Suite
Brute force on password hashes with Hashcat
Use of wordlists to apply brute force attacks

work.name: Taracea Marketing
responsibilities: Creation of 2D and 3D animations and graphic resources

education.area: CFGS Administración de Sistemas Informáticos en Red
education.summary: Specialization in System Administration, with a focus on Development Operations and Cybersecurity. Courses include Virtualization, Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, and Software Development. Participated in bug bounty and CTFs challenges.

education.area: CFGS Diseño y Edición de Publicaciones Impresas y Multimedia
education.summary: Graduated as a top student, gained expertise in graphic design, 3D art and video editing. Served as a video editor assistant, and helped other students to improve their skills.

volunteering.title: Bug Bounty
volunteering.summary: Participated in a project where we did pentesting for five startups and reported the identified vulnerabilities.

projects.name: spsh
projects.description: A simply shell made in pure C
highlights: A simply shell made in pure C.

projects.name: Hacking WiFi Tool
projects.description: Wifi Cracker using tools like aircrack-ng and macchanger
highlights: Tool to automate WiFi attacks (WPA/WPA2 - PSK) aimed at obtaining a password.

projects.name: Spore.io
highlights: Engineered a performance-focused Linux environment with Qtile, enhancing productivity for developers and power users.
Developed custom widgets for system monitoring and task management, streamlining workflows and improving user experience.

projects.name: Web Server
highlights: Automated deployment of an apache web server using Docker containers, as well as monitoring tools for the server.
Developed two lightwieght web apps using Flask: A URLs shortener and a video/audio downloader from YouTube.
CI/CD using Jenkins to test/deploy the apps.

projects.name: Spotify with Terraform
highlights: A Spotify Playlist made with Terraform.

projects.name: DNS server
highlights: This repository contains configuration files for setting up a DNS server with BIND, including master and slave zone management.

projects.name: Web scrapping
highlights: Python program to scrape data from Stack Overflow to grab new questions. Scraped data will be stored in MongoDB.

projects.name: DHCP server
highlights: DHCP server (server) and two clients (c1 and c2) that will get their configuration from the server automatically (c2 based on its MAC address).

projects.name: GUI task manager
projects.description: GUI Task Management in pure C.
highlights: GUI Task Management in pure C.

projects.name: FTP server
highlights: Deployment of a DNS (bind9) and FTP (vsftpd) Server using Vagrant + Ansible.
